title: Purple forest cake
description: An indulgent Black Forest gâteau with three layers of moist chocolate cake, topped with homemade cherry jam, mascarpone cream and Italian meringue. For this recipe you will need 3 x 18cm/7in springform cake tins, a freestanding mixer and a chef's blow torch.
ingredients: 250g/9oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
50g/1¾oz cocoa powder, plus extra for dusting
170g/6oz salted butter, plus extra for greasing
250g/9oz cooked beetroot (natural, not in vinegar), grated
1 vanilla pod, split in half lengthways and seeds scraped out
